## Introduction

This is a guide to using R

## Setup

We will be using the [tidyverse](https://tidyverse.tidyverse.org/) collection of packages throughout. Each of these has to be installed once with the `install.packages` function (e.g. `install.packages("tidyverse")`) and after that you just need to load the libraries whenever you start a new session in R using the two lines below.

```{r packages , message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
```
